statements: SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_title, instructor, schedule_time FROM courses;
SELECT course_title, location, students_enrolled FROM courses WHERE location='Room 101';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT assignment_title, points FROM assignments WHERE due_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT course_title, instructor, schedule_time FROM courses WHERE students_enrolled > max_capacity ORDER BY schedule_time DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM students WHERE enrolled_courses->>'Fall 2022' = 'Mathematics' AND first_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT assignment_title, due_date, points, courses.course_title FROM assignments INNER JOIN courses ON assignments.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE points > 50 ORDER BY due_date ASC
SELECT course_title, COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM courses INNER JOIN students ON students.enrolled_courses->>courses.course_id = courses.course_id GROUP BY courses.course_id
SELECT DISTINCT instructor, location FROM courses ORDER BY instructor ASC, location DESC LIMIT 2
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE students > 20;
SELECT course_id, course_name, students FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_name, students FROM courses ORDER BY students DESC;
SELECT course_id, announcement_text, created_at FROM announcements WHERE course_id = 5;
SELECT course_name, instructor, students FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS student_count FROM courses GROUP BY course_name HAVING student_count > 20;
SELECT courses.course_name, announcements.announcement_text FROM courses JOIN announcements ON courses.course_id = announcements.course_id;
SELECT course_name, instructor, students FROM courses WHERE students < 50 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = TRUE;
SELECT course_name, student_name, enrollment_date FROM courses JOIN enrollments ON courses.course_id = enrollments.course_id;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND course_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_name, student_major FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = TRUE ORDER BY student_name;
SELECT course_name, student_name FROM courses c INNER JOIN enrollments e ON c.course_id = e.course_id INNER JOIN students s ON e.student_id = s.student_id WHERE s.student_major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT c.course_name, s.student_name, e.enrollment_date FROM courses c, enrollments e, students s WHERE c.course_id = e.course_id AND e.student_id = s.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM Course WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Student ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT title, due_date FROM Assignment WHERE grade IS NULL;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade, course_id FROM Grade GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, start_date, end_date FROM Course WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_name, email, enrollment_date, Course.course_name FROM Student JOIN Course ON Student.course_id = Course.course_id WHERE Student.student_id = 1;
SELECT assignment_id, title, due_date, course_id, course_name FROM Assignment JOIN Course ON Assignment.course_id = Course.course_id WHERE Assignment.due_date >= '2022-12-31';

SELECT Student.student_name, Assignment.title, Grade.grade, Grade.comments FROM Student JOIN Grade ON Student.student_id = Grade.student_id JOIN Assignment ON Grade.assignment_id = Assignment.assignment_id WHERE Grade.grade >= 90;

SELECT student_name, email, course_name, title, grade FROM Student JOIN Course ON Student.course_id = Course.course_id JOIN Grade ON Student.student_id = Grade.student_id JOIN Assignment ON Grade.assignment_id = Assignment.assignment_id WHERE Course.instructor_name = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Instructors;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM Courses WHERE capacity > 20;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Instructors WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_name, due_date FROM Assignments ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Instructors WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email, join_date FROM Students WHERE join_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date, capacity FROM Courses WHERE instructor_id = 3;
SELECT assignment_name, due_date FROM Assignments WHERE course_id = 2 AND due_date > '2022-05-20';
